name: Hatsune Miku: Project DIVA ƒ 2nd
description:
Hatsune Miku: Project DIVA ƒ 2nd is an arcade game developed by SEGA and Crypton Future Media. It was originally released in 2014. It was published by SEGA. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Hatsune Miku: Project DIVA ƒ 2nd on PlayStation 3 and PS Vita. The game is sold via PlayStation Store.
